identity.name: Ciudad Feria
identity.tagline: El Corazón Digital de San Sebastián 2026
identity.mission: Fusionar la tradición de la feria con la seguridad de la tecnología moderna.
identity.description: A high-energy, dark-mode interface that captures the electric atmosphere of a night fair. It combines the vibrant yellow, blue, and red of the Venezuelan identity with deep midnight backgrounds and glassmorphism to feel premium and modern.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 font-bold rounded-full px-8 py-6 transition-all hover:scale-105 hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(250,204,21,0.4)]
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary/10 text-secondary hover:bg-secondary/20 border border-secondary/20 rounded-full px-6 py-4
buttons.outline: border-2 border-white/20 hover:border-white text-white bg-transparent rounded-full px-6 py-4

cards.event_card: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-2xl bg-card border border-border hover:border-primary/50 transition-all duration-300 hover:-translate-y-2
cards.ticket_card: relative bg-white text-black rounded-3xl p-6 border-2 border-dashed border-gray-300 mask-image-ticket

inputs.default: bg-background/50 border-border focus:border-primary focus:ring-primary rounded-lg h-12

landing_page.hero: Full-screen immersive layout. Background image with heavy gradient overlay. Huge typography 'SAN SEBASTIÁN 2026'. Floating 3D-style ticket elements.
landing_page.grid_style: Tetris Grid (Mode A). Mix of large event posters and small informational blocks.
landing_page.navigation: Floating glass navbar with blur effect. Sticky on scroll.

events_page.layout: Sidebar filter (desktop) / Drawer filter (mobile) + Masonry grid of event cards.
events_page.card_style: Image-heavy. Date badge in top-right (Neon style). Title and price at bottom.

ticket_flow.layout: Centered single-column stepper. Focus mode (remove header/footer distractions).

assets.icons: Use Lucide React. For social media, use simple SVGs or Lucide icons.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install 'Unbounded' and 'Manrope' fonts from Google Fonts in index.css.
2. CONFIG: Update tailwind.config.js with the 'Neon Folklore' color palette defined above.
3. COMPONENTS: Use Shadcn UI for the 'Ticket Checkout' flow (Form, Input, Button, Dialog, Steps).
4. CUSTOM UI: Build the Landing Page using raw Tailwind + Framer Motion for the 'Tetris Grid'.
5. QR CODE: Use 'react-qr-code' for generating the ticket QR. Wrap it in a 'Gold Border' container to make it look valuable.
6. ANIMATION: Add 'hover:scale-105' to all event cards. Use 'framer-motion' for page transitions.
7. SOCIALS: Create a 'Social Hub' section in the footer with large, glowing icons for Instagram, TikTok, etc.
8. MOCK DATA: Create a 'events_data.js' file with mock events (Concierto de Feria, Desfile de Carrozas, Corrida de Toros, Vuelta al Táchira).
9. TESTING: Add data-testid to the 'Buy Ticket' button and the 'QR Code' container.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text unless it is a very large headline.
Ensure all text on dark backgrounds is at least 'text-gray-300' or lighter for readability.
Never use default scrollbars. Hide them or style them thin.
Images must have 'object-cover' and 'rounded-xl' in most cases.
